Copy up-to-date enterprise.wsdl.xml to the main folder
and run "updateWSDL.bat" for the first use

#################################################
in build.properties.test and build.properties.prod :

 - type in your userName and passwd (with token) for your test env and prod env


#################################################
in cfg.xml :
 - type in your userName and passwd (with token) for your test env and prod env
 - specify url of server where customSettings are stored



#################################################
use config.xml to configure what will be comapared

note:
to compare enviroments properly all information you typed in must be valid!!
